name: Hilltop Pharmacy
description: A small neighborhood pharmacy sits at the corner of a cracked intersection. {SURVIVOR1} and {SURVIVOR2} approach cautiously; the {RELATIONSHIP} notice the front window has been smashed, but shelves still stand.

name: Cedar Grove Gas Stop
description: A lonely gas station squats beside the highway. The pumps are dead, but the convenience store looks mostly intact. A faded sign creaks in the wind.

name: Maple Row Suburban Home
description: A quiet house stands among others long abandoned. {SURVIVOR1} pushes open the broken door while {SURVIVOR2} keeps watch on the silent street.

name: Starlight Grocery
description: A medium-sized grocery store with its automatic doors shattered. The aisles inside look chaotic, but not fully looted.

name: Briarwood Elementary
description: An old elementary school sits surrounded by an empty playground. {SURVIVOR2} glances at the dark windows while {SURVIVOR1} listens for movement inside.

name: Redwater Police Substation
description: A compact police station reinforced with steel doors. Old patrol cars rot out front. The interior might still hold weaponsâ€”or trouble.

name: East Highway Motel
description: A flickering motel sign buzzes in the dusk. Multiple room doors are wide open, and shadows move behind torn curtains.

name: Greenfield Farm
description: The remnants of a farmhouse sit beside a collapsed barn. {SURVIVOR1} spots rusting equipment while {SURVIVOR2} circles the fields.

name: Pinebridge Clinic
description: A small medical clinic rests on the corner of a dead street. The interior looks ransacked but still promising.

name: Appalachian Ranger Cabin
description: A wooden ranger cabin overlooks dense forest. A map board outside has been shredded by weather.

name: Mountain View Gas & Diner
description: A tiny station with an attached diner. Tables inside remain half-set, as if abandoned in a rush.

name: Highridge School Campus
description: A sprawling high school complex. Broken lockers spill contents across the hallways. Every noise echoes.

name: Floodplain Subdivision
description: Several rows of townhouses sit abandoned, many with kicked-in doors. The area feels strangely untouched.

name: Old Mill Supermarket
description: A huge supermarket lies dark and silent. Shopping carts block the entrance as if used for a barricade.

name: Rusthook Farmstead
description: A weather-beaten farm on the hillside. Several outbuildings lean dangerously, but one barn still stands.

name: Abandoned Guard Depot
description: Tall fences surround an old National Guard depot. It looks half-looted but still fortified.

name: Midwest Rest Stop Plaza
description: A large rest stop with a central plaza and empty food courts. Cars sit abandoned in chaotic patterns.

name: Three Pines Motel
description: A long row of ground-floor rooms sits under a collapsing roof. Most windows are smashed.

name: Cobalt Springs Suburb
description: A suburban neighborhood with cul-de-sacs filled with abandoned cars. Several homes remain unbroken into.

name: Western Plains Farm
description: An open farmstead with large silos and a wide barn. Wind whistles through empty fields.

name: Civic Center Clinic
description: A rural clinic stands with smashed doors but intact exam rooms deeper inside.

name: Northline Ranger Station
description: A lakeside ranger lookout stands tall on wooden stilts, offering visibility but not safety.

name: Philadelphia Ruins
description: The shell of Philadelphia rises around the {RELATIONSHIP}. Streets choke with wreckage and silent danger.

name: Pittsburgh Collapse
description: Steel bridges twist into the river. Echoes travel strangely through the hollowed-out streets.

name: Cleveland Dead Zone
description: Factories loom like rusted giants. Every step into the dark city feels like an invitation.
